Tinley_Park.Rich Central High School: Rich Central High School or RCHS is a public four-year high school located in Olympia Fields, Illinois, a southern suburb of Chicago, Illinois, in the United States. The Rich Central Campus serves the cities of Matteson, Richton Park, Country Club Hills, Tinley Park, and parts of Olympia Fields, serving sections of school districts 162, 161, 160, and 159. It is a part of Rich Township District 227, which also includes Rich East High School and Rich South High School.
